fields.summary: Android: KS Facebook>Run Query does not display status messages of friends

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
"Query" does not display status messages.

Steps:
1. Log in to Facebook with Appcel.friend's account
2. Post a status message
3. Run KitchenSink
4. Go to Mashups-Facebook-Query
5. Log in to Facebook with Appcelerator's account
6. Click on "Run Query"

Actual result: 
Friends are displayed, but no status messages are shown

Expected result: 
Friends should be displayed with their status messages
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink - "Query" does not display status messages
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.0.1.201204132053
Titanium SDK: 2.0.2.v20120417133255
Device: iPhone 4S (5.1)

comments.body:
Failed on:

Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.1.201207161421
Titanium SDK, build: 2.1.1.v20120718121609
Device: iPad 5.1
Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
